attributes.action: Allow Ben Harris to have hooves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ben Harris is currently being victimised because he chooses to wear hooves at home , at work and in the street. Since the introduction of this hoofage he has been attacked and praised in equal measure. We the undersigned strongly believe that any person on this earth should be allowed to wear hooves whenever and wherever they please without fear of recrimination

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
